org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler

Interface LightningHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLNDLightningHandler, SimpleBaseLNDLightningHandler, SpringLNDLightningHandler

    public interface LightningHandler
    Interface for used lightning implementation creating and listening for settled invoices. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-11-24.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Method to close the LND connections and release underlying resources.
      void connect(LightningHandlerContext context)
      Method to open up a connection to the configured LND node.
      Invoice generateInvoice(PreImageData preImageData, ConvertedOrder paymentData)
      Method to create an invoice in the underlying lightning node.
      NodeInfo getNodeInfo()
      Method to fetch the related lightning node's information to include in invoices.
      boolean isConnected()
      Method to check if handler is connected to node.
      Invoice lookupInvoice(byte[] preImageHash)
      Method to lookup an invoice in LND given the invoice's pre-image hash.
      void registerListener(LightningEventListener listener)
      Method to register a listener to recieve notification about updated invoices and settled invoices.
      void unregisterListener(LightningEventListener listener)
      Method to remove a listener from the list of event listeners of events related to adding or settling invoices.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect(LightningHandlerContext context)
      throws java.io.IOException,
             InternalErrorException
        Method to open up a connection to the configured LND node. Calls to register and un-register listeners should be done before opening a connection to make sure the listeners receives all invoice notifications.
        Parameters:
        context - the last context by the payment handler, containing the indicies of the last invoices processed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occurred opening up a connection with LND node.

      • generateInvoice

        Invoice generateInvoice(PreImageData preImageData,
                        ConvertedOrder paymentData)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        InternalErrorException
        Method to create an invoice in the underlying lightning node.
        Parameters:
        preImageData - the generated pre image and hash to use in invoice.
        paymentData - the payment data to generate invoice for.
        Returns:
        the generated invoice data containing bolt11 invoice etc.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if problems occurred generating the invoice.

      • registerListener

        void registerListener(LightningEventListener listener)
               throws InternalErrorException
        Method to register a listener to recieve notification about updated invoices and settled invoices.
        Parameters:
        listener - the event listener to add to list receiving notifications.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if problems occurred registering from listeners.

      • unregisterListener

        void unregisterListener(LightningEventListener listener)
                 throws InternalErrorException
        Method to remove a listener from the list of event listeners of events related to adding or settling invoices.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to remove from list of listeners.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if problems occurred un-registering from listeners.

      • lookupInvoice

        Invoice lookupInvoice(byte[] preImageHash)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      InternalErrorException
        Method to lookup an invoice in LND given the invoice's pre-image hash.
        Parameters:
        preImageHash - the pre image hash of the invoice to lookup.
        Returns:
        related invoice, null if not found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occurred communication or parsing invoice with lightning node.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    InternalErrorException
        Method to check if handler is connected to node.
        Returns:
        true if connected,
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occurred checking connection status.

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.io.IOException,
           InternalErrorException
        Method to close the LND connections and release underlying resources.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occurred closing the connections with lightning node.

      • getNodeInfo

        NodeInfo getNodeInfo()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     InternalErrorException
        Method to fetch the related lightning node's information to include in invoices.
        Returns:
        the related lightning node's information
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occurred closing the connections with lightning node.
